bug.short_desc: setVisibility() has no effect on qx.ui.tabview.Page

long_desc.thetext:
setVisibility("hidden") or setVisibility("excluded") has no effect on qx.ui.tabview.Page objects in a qx.ui.tabview.TabView.
Here's a sample: http://tinyurl.com/bv6wkhr
IMO it should write a log message, if it isn't supported.

setVisibility does work for tabView, although not the way some people would expect it to work: on a tabview pane only one page is shown ("visible") at a time, all the other pages are "hidden"
buttons on the bar, on the opposite are always "visible", so if you want to hide a "tab": you might want to a) switch to other page, b) hide the corresponding button (page.getButton())
to make things simplier a setPageVisibility method be introduced for a TabView
smth like a setColumnVisible: setPageVisibile(Integer col, Boolean visible)
